description: Retrieves a list of active processes running on the system.
Gets the status of services on a local or remote machine.
Retrieves Windows event logs from local or remote systems.
Clears entries from an event log.
Lists files and directories (alias: ls, dir).
Copies files or directories to a new location.
Moves files or directories to a new location.
Writes or replaces content in a file.
Downloads content from a web endpoint.
Sends HTTP/REST requests and parses JSON responses.
Sends ICMP echo pings to test network connectivity.
Queries WMI objects (deprecated in favor of CIM).
Creates a new file, folder, or registry entry.
Modifies an existing item (file, registry key, etc.).
Retrieves an item from a specified location.
Creates a new Active Directory user.
Gets the results of a background job.
Lists available cmdlets, functions, and aliases.
Writes objects to a CSV file.
Reads objects from a CSV file.
Converts an object to JSON format.
Creates a new local user account.
